results.name: Need for Speed: Carbon – Own the City
Two Worlds II HD - Shattered Embrace

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 @ 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Multi Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 4.0 @ 1.5 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: with 5.1 Support

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can likely run on lower rated hardware, but we can't guarantee the performance or provide support.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7-3770, AMD FX 8350 4.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This recommended is based on what many of us tested the game on while in development. We're confident it supports a smooth experience.
